item.title: Gen-Z Is Learning the Unwritten Rules of the Office. These Coaches Are Helping
item.description: There are unspoken rules about how to behave in offices. Not everyone has gotten the memo.

item.title: The Senate Just Passed Trump’s Tax Package. The House Now Faces a July 4th Deadline
item.description: The sprawling bill could increase the deficit by $4 trillion. Could that tank the Big Beautiful Bill’s chances in the House?

item.title: How HR Leaders Can Reduce Workplace Complaint Numbers
item.description: A new survey shows employee complaints are at record levels, and urges human resources chiefs to firm up policies for handling them.

item.title: The 10 Best Workplaces in North Carolina
item.description: These companies based in North Carolina made Inc.’s 2025 Best Workplaces list.

item.title: What Prada’s Sandal Crisis Teaches About Business Ethics and Crisis Communications
item.description: For businesses, inspiration is one thing, but appropriation is another.
